data.text: It'll bounce right off. Gotta deal with the barrier first.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We are to proceed as planned.
data.speaker: Rude

data.text: This is bullshit. What the hell are they thinking?
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: "Threats to public order are to be summarily put down." This is what we've always done.
data.speaker: Rude

data.text: Guess it's a little late to grow a conscience.
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: Don't worry. We'll make it in time.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Still in one piece here too.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It'll be fine! We've got a bodyguard, don't forget. Mine!
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: You're just being modest! After you!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey...can we talk? Just for a bit?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Gonna need to find another way through.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: ...And...the kids that the black wind carries away have to live in the train graveyard forever and ever!
data.speaker: Marlene

data.text: So you have to stay far, far away from there!
data.speaker: Marlene

data.text: Oh, you know Betty? Yesterday she went with her daddy to...to...
data.speaker: Marlene

data.text: Actually...he might not make it home tonight.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We can't waste any more time here.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text:
Plate separation code is...
Got it?
data.speaker: Tseng

data.text: Yeah, yeah, of course I do! We can drop the damn thing whenever...
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: You got a death wish or something?
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: Because I sure as shit don't.
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: Reno, what's happening? Do we have a problem?
data.speaker: Tseng

data.text: Not really. Small arms fire from some local boys trying to defend the pillar.
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: More would-be heroes, huh? Sending reinforcements.
data.speaker: Tseng

data.text: The more players that take the stage, the better.
data.speaker: Tseng

data.text: So that's what we are, huh?
data.speaker: Reno

data.text: Contact me when the mission is complete.
data.speaker: Tseng

data.text: They're really gonna drop the plate.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: They won't if Barret and the others have anything to say about it.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: All we can do now is keep moving.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Please... Please let us be in time.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I don't have time for your shit.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: All this time, you were waiting for someone to come and play with you.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: C'mon, let's get back to the crane.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: The kids that the black wind carries away have to live in the train graveyard forever and ever!
data.speaker: Marlene

data.text: You're just trying to help, aren't you?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Do you think there's...more in here?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We could get lost in here.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This is the train graveyard all right─a real treasure trove of scrap.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Sector 7 should be just past that large maintenance facility over there.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I vote we stay in the light so we can see where we're going.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: People don't come around here often.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: And not just because of the monsters, but...because of the stories.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Everyone seems to think that the train graveyard...is haunted.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: "Those who lose their way out there in the dark of night will never, ever find their way back home again."
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I mean, it's not like I think it's true or anything, but you know...it's just...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I think I just heard a little kid... Did you guys hear it too?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Why would there be kids out here this late?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This train will be stopping at the Sector 7 slums...and is bound for the train graveyard.
The train will depart shortly. Please stand clear of the closing doors.
This train will be stopping at the Sector 7 slums and is bound for the train graveyard.
The train will depart shortly. Please stand clear of the closing doors.
It's not working. There's no power coming through.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I wonder if this is another prank? Someone might be messing with the power supply to make us run around.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Just like we hoped! What a relief.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We should be able to get through now.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Maybe now we can get to the other side.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: This path is blocked too? But we're so close, I can see it.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, do you think these trains might still run?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Good call. Looks like it still works.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'm pretty sure I saw a door on the other side of this place. I think our only choice might be to find another route.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: "Those who lose their way out there in the dark of night will never, ever find their way back home again."
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What do you guys think would've happened if they'd caught us?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I wonder... Maybe they're the ones who were caught.
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Can we just drop the whole─
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What if they're trapped here and can't leave?
data.speaker: Aerith

data.text: Nothing you need to worry about. Let's get going.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I wonder if some of the cars here can still move.
data.speaker: Tifa
